author: Retro Game Corps
description:
Anbernic's latest vertical handheld is an excellent mix of design, comfort, screen and performance.  Let's dig in.

** The handheld goes on sale 20DEC at 5am EST.  The links below won't work properly until then **

Anbernic direct: https://tinyurl.com/AnbernicRG477V
AliExpress: https://s.click.aliexpress.com/e/_c3RhU7c9

Black Frame Insertion guide video: https://youtu.be/d2GS7wDa2XI
Favorite handhelds of 2025: https://youtu.be/sYx6mklb23c

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this review ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

title: Anbernic RG477V: Their Best Vertical Yet
